# 5 分钟商学院精细笔记 000_185

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-000-185
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-000-185
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-000-185
x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-000-185 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-linglingling-yibawu
x5-fenzhong-shangxueyuan-jingxi-biji-linglingling-yibawu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
